title: Tony and Carson Serino from Serino Cigars
itunes:title: Tony and Carson Serino from Serino Cigars
description: It's been a tradition on The Cigar Authority that on Father's Day weekend to be joined by a Father & Son team in the Cigar Industry, and we keep that tradition alive today as Tony and Carson Serino from Serion Cigars joins us live!
